templateOptions.label: baseURL
templateOptions.description: Hostname (and path) to the root, e.g. http://bep.is/

templateOptions.label: languageCode
templateOptions.description: The site’s language code.

templateOptions.label: languageName
templateOptions.description: The site’s language name.

templateOptions.label: title
templateOptions.description: Site title.

templateOptions.label: theme
templateOptions.description: Theme to use (located by default in /themes/THEMENAME/).

templateOptions.label: themesDir
templateOptions.description: The directory where Hugo reads the themes from.

templateOptions.label: sectionPagesMenu
templateOptions.description: See 'Section Menu for Lazy Bloggers'.

templateOptions.label: googleAnalytics
templateOptions.description: Google Analytics tracking ID.

templateOptions.label: archetypeDir
templateOptions.description: The directory where Hugo finds archetype files (content templates).

templateOptions.label: assetDir
templateOptions.description: The directory where Hugo finds asset files used in Hugo Pipes.

templateOptions.label: buildDrafts
templateOptions.description: Include drafts when building.

templateOptions.label: buildExpired
templateOptions.description: Include content already expired.

templateOptions.label: buildFuture
templateOptions.description: Include content with publishdate in the future.

templateOptions.label: canonifyURLS
templateOptions.description: Enable to turn relative URLs into absolute.

templateOptions.label: contentDir
templateOptions.description: The directory from where Hugo reads content files.

templateOptions.label: dataDir
templateOptions.description: The directory from where Hugo reads data files.

templateOptions.label: defaultContentLanguage
templateOptions.description: Content without language indicator will default to this language.

templateOptions.label: defaultContentLanguageInSubdir
templateOptions.description: Render the default content language in subdir, e.g. content/en/. The site root / will then redirect to /en/.

templateOptions.label: disableHugoGeneratorInject
templateOptions.description: Hugo will, by default, inject a generator meta tag in the HTML head on the home page only. You can turn it off, but we would really appreciate if you don’t, as this is a good way to watch Hugo’s popularity on the rise.

templateOptions.label: disableKinds
templateOptions.description: Enable disabling of all pages of the specified Kinds. Allowed values in this list: 'page', 'home', 'section', 'taxonomy', 'taxonomyTerm', 'RSS', 'sitemap', 'robotsTXT', '404'.

templateOptions.label: disableLiveReload
templateOptions.description: Disable automatic live reloading of browser window.

templateOptions.label: disablePathToLower
templateOptions.description: Do not convert the url/path to lowercase.

templateOptions.label: enableEmoji
templateOptions.description: Enable Emoji emoticons support for page content; see the Emoji Cheat Sheet.

templateOptions.label: enableGitInfo
templateOptions.description: Enable .GitInfo object for each page (if the Hugo site is versioned by Git). This will then update the Lastmod parameter for each page using the last git commit date for that content file.

templateOptions.label: enableMissingTranslationPlaceholders
templateOptions.description: Show a placeholder instead of the default value or an empty string if a translation is missing.

templateOptions.label: enableRobotsTXT
templateOptions.description: Enable generation of robots.txt file.

templateOptions.label: footnoteAnchorPrefix
templateOptions.description: Prefix for footnote anchors.

templateOptions.label: footnoteReturnLinkContents
templateOptions.description: Text to display for footnote return links.

templateOptions.label: hasCJKLanguage
templateOptions.description: If true, auto-detect Chinese/Japanese/Korean Languages in the content. This will make .Summary and .WordCount behave correctly for CJK languages.

templateOptions.label: layoutDir
templateOptions.description: The directory from where Hugo reads layouts (templates).

templateOptions.label: log
templateOptions.description: Enable logging.

templateOptions.label: logFile
templateOptions.description: Log File path (if set, logging enabled automatically).

templateOptions.label: metaDataFormat
templateOptions.description: Front matter meta-data format. Valid values: 'toml', 'yaml', or 'json'.

templateOptions.label: newContentEditor
templateOptions.description: The editor to use when creating new content.

templateOptions.label: noChmod
templateOptions.description: Don’t sync permission mode of files.

templateOptions.label: noTimes
templateOptions.description: Don’t sync modification time of files.

templateOptions.label: paginatePath
templateOptions.description: The path element used during pagination (https://example.com/page/2).

templateOptions.label: pluralizeListTitles
templateOptions.description: Pluralize titles in lists.

templateOptions.label: preserveTaxonomyNames
templateOptions.description: Preserve special characters in taxonomy names (“Gérard Depardieu” vs “Gerard Depardieu”).

templateOptions.label: publishDir
templateOptions.description: The directory to where Hugo will write the final static site (the HTML files etc.).

templateOptions.label: pygmentsCodeFencesGuessSyntax
templateOptions.description: Enable syntax guessing for code fences without specified language.

templateOptions.label: pygmentsStyle
templateOptions.description: Color-theme or style for syntax highlighting

templateOptions.label: pygmentsUseClasses
templateOptions.description: Enable using external CSS for syntax highlighting.

templateOptions.label: relativeURLs
templateOptions.description: Enable this to make all relative URLs relative to content root. Note that this does not affect absolute URLs.

templateOptions.label: refLinksErrorLevel
templateOptions.description: When using ref or relref to resolve page links and a link cannot resolved, it will be logged with this logg level. Valid values are ERROR (default) or WARNING. Any ERROR will fail the build (exit -1).

templateOptions.label: refLinksNotFoundURL
templateOptions.description: URL to be used as a placeholder when a page reference cannot be found in ref or relref. Is used as-is.

templateOptions.label: rssLimit
templateOptions.description: Maximum number of items in the RSS feed.

templateOptions.label: staticDir
templateOptions.description: A directory or a list of directories from where Hugo reads static files.

templateOptions.label: stepAnalysis
templateOptions.description: Display memory and timing of different steps of the program.

templateOptions.label: summaryLength
templateOptions.description: The length of text to show in a .Summary.

templateOptions.label: timeout
templateOptions.description: Timeout for generating page contents, in milliseconds (defaults to 10 seconds). Note: this is used to bail out of recursive content generation, if your pages are slow to generate (e.g., because they require large image processing or depend on remote contents) you might need to raise this limit.

templateOptions.label: uglyURLs
templateOptions.description: When enabled, creates URL of the form /filename.html instead of /filename/.

templateOptions.label: verbose
templateOptions.description: Enable verbose output.

templateOptions.label: verboseLog
templateOptions.description: Enable verbose logging.

templateOptions.label: watch
templateOptions.description: Watch filesystem for changes and recreate as needed.

templateOptions.label: blackfriday
templateOptions.description: Blackfriday options

templateOptions.label: extensions
templateOptions.description: Enable one or more Blackfriday’s Markdown extensions

templateOptions.label: imaging
templateOptions.description: You can configure an imaging section in config.toml with default image processing options:

templateOptions.label: resampleFilter
templateOptions.description: Default resample filter used for resizing.

templateOptions.label: quality
templateOptions.description: Default JPEG quality setting.

templateOptions.label: anchor
templateOptions.description: Anchor used when cropping pictures.

templateOptions.label: Menu Items
templateOptions.description: Menu Items

templateOptions.label: Menu Name
templateOptions.description: A menu is a named array of menu entries accessible by name via the .Site.Menus site variable. For example, you can access your site’s main menu via .Site.Menus.main.

templateOptions.label: identifier
templateOptions.description: It is necessary to set a unique identifier manually if two or more menu entries have the same .Name.

templateOptions.label: name
templateOptions.description: Name of the menu entry.

templateOptions.label: pre
templateOptions.description: string representing HTML.

templateOptions.label: post
templateOptions.description: string representing HTML.

templateOptions.label: url
templateOptions.description: URL that the menu entry points to.

templateOptions.label: weight
templateOptions.description: Weight of the menu item

templateOptions.label: parent
templateOptions.description: Name (or Identifier if present) of this menu entry’s parent menu entry.
